formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'Return' =-
[Synopsis] Return from gosub routine
[Description] Return() Jumps to the last label on the stack, removing it.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,5 +4,6 @@ Return from gosub routine
[Description] - Return() - Jumps to the last label on the stack, removing it. + Return([return-value]): + Jumps to the last label on the stack, removing it. The return value, if + any, is saved in the channel variable GOSUB_RETVAL.
